Title: Keeper's Rest
Description:
I do not enjoy seeing others forged by Tyr disabled. They went through such effort to keep the tomb from collapsing, and now it will languish devoid of even what was left of Tyr's light.

<Koranos gestures to the Silver Scale.>

I hope whatever is in the scale is worth their destruction. Let us find another console to see what, if anything, is on the scale.
